attributes.action: Parliament must stop the Chagos deal!
attributes.additional_details:
This deal sucks! Let’s prove that it is the most ridiculous, unpopular policy ever. Please share this petition with your friends!

Keir Starmer’s deal is a total stitch-up of a defenceless group of people, the Chagossians, who have been tormented by the Mauritian government for 60 years because of racial hatred toward the colour of their skin.

The treaty is nuts, we will have to pay billions *with interest* until the year 2164. This is madness at a time of deep cuts to social security.
attributes.background:
The Chagos deal is a terrible disaster. What kind of country do we live in, that the Government will betray the indigenous Chagossian people, and our national interests?

The House of Commons has the sovereign power to block legislation. There will be a “Chagos Bill”. MPs must stop it. All of it.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action:  https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/702712
